John Pehrsson

John Pehrsson was born in Höör, Malmöhus (Skåne), Sverige (Sweden) in 1779. By 1813, he was married to Pernilla Mansdotter (b. 1785 Munkarp) and the two of them were living in Maglasäte No. 6 (1A). Their second son, Nils Johnsson was born on the 14th of September, 1816. Seven years later, John’s first wife, Pernilla, died at the age of 37 on the 25th of December, 1822 (1C). John remarried in 1824 to Elna Nilsdotter (1C). Seven years later, John died in 1831 at the age of 52 (1E).

References

1. Sweden, Malmöhus Church Records, 1541-1918; index 1646-1860, images, FamilySearch. Landsarkivet Sverige, Lund (Sweden Regional Archives, Lund).
